title: Precision aikido 3
creator_credit: Michael Field and Kiko Pty Ltd
brief_description: Precision Aikido 3 summarises and expands on Precision Aikido 2. Provides detailed “How to do it” instructions for Aikido’s third, fourth, fifth and sixth locking and pinning techniques (Sankyo and Yonkyo Omote and Ura Wazas plus Gokyo and Rokyo Wazas), 37 variations in total. Includes demonstrations of techniques from all other Aikido technical catagories. Ideal for students and instructors of Aikido. Please note: this program has ongoing timer at the top of the screen.
